4319000.name: Combat Mission Shock Force 2: Battle Pack
4319000.description:
IMPORTANT: This content requires the base game "Combat Mission: Shock Force 2" on Steam in order to play.

Combat Mission Shock Force 2: Battle Pack expands the modern warfare sandbox with a focused set of intense, small-scale engagements set in the turbulent aftermath of a hypothetical NATO invasion of Syria.

Damascus has fallen, but the war is far from over. Regime loyalists, isolated military units, and local militias continue to resist across the country, some determined to fight to the last man, others prepared to wage a grinding insurgency against occupying forces. Battle Pack places players directly into these unstable flashpoints, emphasizing tactical decision-making, asymmetric warfare, and hard-fought urban and rural combat.

Key Features

  • 4 New Campaigns

    • The Hornet’s Nest – A US Army platoon operating in downtown Damascus discovers that a routine mission has escalated into a deadly trap.

    • The Bitter Enders – A US Task Force methodically clears a heavily fortified urban stronghold held by regime loyalists.

    • Probable Cause – US Special Forces deploy into rugged mountain terrain to locate and dismantle a hidden IED manufacturing operation.

    • Inglorious Footnote – Syrian defenders at Hmeimim Airbase brace for a final, desperate stand against overwhelming odds.

  • 7 Standalone Scenarios
    A diverse set of engagements ranging from insurgent raids on vulnerable mortar positions to neighbourhood militias clashing over humanitarian aid, offering varied tactical challenges and replayability.

  • 5 Master Maps for Scenario Designers
    Large, detailed maps based on real Syrian locations, designed to support custom scenario creation and advanced mission design.
